item.title: WDC
item.description: score:-121 Chances: Western Digital has made significant progress towards completing the separation of its flash memory and traditional hard-disk drive businesses. The company has named chief executives for the soon-to-be separated businesses, indicating a clear path forward. It has received recognition as one of the Worldâ€™s Most Ethical Companies for 2024, which could positively impact investor sentiment.
